oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Souvenir program for 1931 United Confederate Veterans reunion
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Souvenir program from the Forty-First United Confederate Veterans Reunion, held in Montgomery, Ala. on June 2-5, 1931. Inside speaks of Montgomery as "The Old South's Shrine" and "Cradle of the Furled Flag Where the Lost Cause had its Throne."
